description: Try our easy to follow Carrot Cake Crumble Cheesecake Bars recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Carrot Cake Crumble Cheesecake Bars Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 430 g free from gluten carrot cake mix

recipeInstructions.text: Empty icing sachet from cake mix into a bowl. Add 1 1/2 tsp boiling water, then stir until smooth. Transfer slice to a board, drizzle with icing. Stand for 20 minutes or until set, then cut into bars and serve.
